headline: McKesson Corporation (MCK): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on McKesson Corporation on The Buyside Guy’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on MCK. McKesson Corporation’s share was trading at $710.94 as of August 4th. MCK’s trailing and forward P/E were 27.17 and 18.69, respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
